name: International Association of Medical Equipment Remarketers and Servicers, Inc.
goal: IAMERS is an international trade association focused on the sales and servicing of remarketed, refurbished, remanufactured and leased diagnostic imaging equipment by independent sellers and servicers. Working with stakeholders, IAMERS seeks to encourage competition and a level playing field. IAMERS is dedicated to patient safety and ethical conduct in the secondary market. IAMERS members enjoy successful working relationships with many manufacturers of diagnostic imaging equipment including assisting multi-vendor sales and servicing.
interests: Competition, Fraud prevention, Public Health, Trade
euInitiatives: Medical Device Regulation, Competition, ROHS, REACH, Data Protection and Procurement.
